dcterms:creator: A. Fader
L. Zettlemoyer
O. Etzioni
dcterms:description: A large-scale QA dataset consisting of 14M statements, stored as (subject, relation, object) triples, which includes a combination of pseudo-labeled QA pairs and paraphrased questions.
dcterms:title: QA dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Bordes
N. Usunier
R. Collobert
J. Weston
dcterms:description: A simulated world QA dataset generated from a simple simulation involving characters, objects, and rooms, producing 7K statements and 3K questions.
dcterms:title: Simulated World QA

dcterms:creator: J. Weston
A. Bordes
S. Chopra
T. Mikolov
dcterms:description: A set of synthetic QA tasks designed to test various forms of reasoning and deduction, consisting of 20 different types of tasks.
dcterms:title: Synthetic QA tasks

dcterms:creator: A. Bordes
J. Weston
N. Usunier
dcterms:description: A dataset used for open question answering with weakly supervised embedding models, including two versions: one with embeddings only and another with Bag of Words features.
dcterms:title: MemNN (embedding only)

dcterms:creator: A. Bordes
J. Weston
N. Usunier
dcterms:description: A dataset used for open question answering with weakly supervised embedding models, including two versions: one with embeddings only and another with Bag of Words features.
dcterms:title: MemNN (with BoW features)
